code:
from flask import Flask, request, abort, make\_response, render\_template

app = Flask(\_\_name\_)

@app.route('/items')
def items():
per\_page = int(request.args.get('per\_page', 10))
page = int(request.args.get('page', 1))

if per\_page > 50 or per\_page < 1:
abort(400)

items = [x for x in range(100)]

start = (page - 1) \* per\_page
end = start + per\_page

paginated\_items = items[start:end]

response = make\_response(render\_template('items.html', items=paginated\_items, per\_page=per\_page, page=page))
response.headers['X-Total-Count'] = str(len(items))
return response

if **name** == '**main**':
app.run(debug=True)
prompt: Flask ile pagination yapan endpoint yaz.
